verses.verse: {Israel's Praise to the Lord} d At that time, {Lit. day} you will say: "I will praise you, Lord , for although you were angry with me, your anger has turned away, and you have comforted me.

"Look! God yes God is {So 1QIsa a ; MT reads Look! God is ; LXX reads Look! The Lord is the God of} my salvation; I will trust, and not be afraid. For the Lord {So 1QIsa a MT mss LXX; MT reads Lord God} is my strength and my song, {So 1QIsa a MT mss LXX; MT reads a song} and he has become my salvation."
You will draw water joyfully from the wells of salvation. And you will say at that time: {Lit. say in that day}
"Give thanks to the Lord; call on his name. Make known his actions among the nations. Proclaim that his name is exalted.

"Sing praises to the Lord , {So 1QIsa a ; MT reads to the Lord ; LXX reads to the name of the Lord} because he has acted gloriously, being made {So Isa a MT qere Syr Targ; the Heb. lacks made} known in all the world.
Shout aloud, and sing for joy, you who live in Zion, because great in your midst is the Holy One of Israel."
